title: Al Kuwait Sports Club Stadium
text: Al Kuwait Kaifan Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Kuwait%20City">Kuwait City</a>, <a href="Kuwait">Kuwait</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and hosts the home matches of <a href="Al%20Kuwait%20Kaifan">Al Kuwait Kaifan</a>. The stadium holds 12,350. This stadium had also hosted Kuwait's national team matches during the <a href="2010%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification">2010 FIFA World Cup qualification</a>, which they failed to reach. The stadium hosted the final matches of the <a href="Kuwait%20Emir%20Cup">Kuwait Emir Cup</a> and <a href="Kuwait%20Crown%20Cup">Kuwait Crown Cup</a> for the last 5 seasons. This stadium also hosted matches for the <a href="Kuwait%20national%20football%20team">national team</a> during the <a href="3rd%20Arabian%20Gulf%20Cup">3rd Arabian Gulf Cup</a>, where Kuwait won their third title after winning 4–0 against <a href="Saudi%20Arabia%20national%20football%20team">Saudi Arabia</a>.
